column4: Hello, anybody have anyexperience with Broadcom wireless card in ubuntu?
what are you having trouble with?
can you help me?  I cannot use my wireless at all.  it wont detect networks and when I manually put in theinformation it wont connecteither
this is a fresh install of ubuntu 9.04, and it installed 'fwcutter' right after it booted up
what type of security is the router using?
I'm unsure.  I know the passcode but i cannot access the gateway page to check the settings.
is this your network?  It should say in the dropdown menu what encryption is used, WEP, WPA, WPA2
its myparents, I cant see the network on any lists...
andrew__:Hhmm... i've had some trouble with the broadcomm chips on my sisters computer.  It worked best with no encryption used ... that might be the main problem.  what type of laptop are you using?
after fwcutter install, you rebooted?  Could you ever 'see' the network in the dropdown list?
i have not rebooted.  i have not seen ANY network in a drop down list.
I think I'll reboot now... i'llbrb
not one person in here using an MID?
